reviewText: I loved watching 3rd rock from the sun, I was so happy to see the box set here on Amazon, as soon as I got it I spend some time at home watching nothing but this show, anyone that used to watch this is going to be so happy to have this full collection, these guys are just way too funny, this show is a true classic and I can safely say even after all these years that this is one of the best shows I saw on NBC .

reviewText: The complete set is such fun!  I fell back in love with 3rd rock when I saw some reruns, and I think that it is hysterical.  I decided to purchase the complete set - because there are favorites from every season.  The two Dick cliff hanger, Pickles the dog, The Big Giant Head, the Super Bowl plot - come on, where else do you see such craziness?

reviewText: Without a doubt, 3rd Rock From the Sun is one of the most hilarious shows ever on television. Every episode lets you view the world in newer more screwball ways, through the eyes of these aliens trying to fit into the "real" world. It's wonderful to see how truly insane our own "normal" looks to them!3rd Rock was perfectly cast, and the actors' interactions are a joy to watch.This collectin is 6 seasons of perfection that you'll enjoy over and over again!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I've just started watching this again and it's fantastic. I watched it years ago and missed an episode now and then. It's been so long that I've forgotten most of them.I just love the actors, it's great casting. Who can forget John Lithgow, or the Amazonian Kristen Johnston or the quirky French Stewart, or Mamie Dubcek or Jan Hooks?And the comedy has lost nothing in the last 10 years, it's even funnier if that's possible. I just watched the jinx episode and laughed so hard that I had tears coming out of my eyes when Dick Solomon brought Mrs. Dubcek in and introduced her as "Dr. Mamie Dubcek, my esteemed colleague". Gor, I just love it.There are 139 episode in all. At 20 mins each and if I watch 3 episodes a day, that's 46+ days of incredible entertainment. I look forward to it!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This has my vote for the best series ever. I have seen every episode around 6-10 times. I watch the whole series at least once every year. This is the only show that I have cried during the final episode because I really felt like I was apart of the whole experience. 3rd Rock From The Sun is such a great show, and I can't stop watching all the seasons I bought here on Amazon. They are in excellent condition even for being used, so that rocks. If you haven't seen this show, PLEASE go watch it somewhere, or better yet buy the complete seasons! Absolutely 100% hilarity that leaves my family in stitches. God bless you Sally, Harry, Tommy, and high commander!..............Across the void we come a warpingAcross the fields of stars we soarWe pledge to land and something somethingDum da da da dum da da da spaceshipAnd when at last our missions finishedIn duty homeward shall we flyOur glory cannot be diminishedBack to the heavens in our mighty spaceshipOut of everything I have ever bought on Amazon, I must say that this package of dvds is my most favorite item purchased, and I have used Amazon for hundreds of buys!!5/5John Mcadam:Were Ancient Gods From Other Planets?
Title: N/A

reviewText: They weren't the best on continuity - they left plenty of loose ends after they left Earth, but face it - this was one of the best sitcoms ever on tv.  They had the best cast and they best angle.  I haven't had this many laugh out louds in years.  I know Lithgow is the 'star' but everyone is in this series -- watching Tommy grow up is a trip in itself.  Sally and her ever changing relationship with Don and the best of the crew, for me, is Harry.  Living in a literal world and flat out slap stick comedy.  It's very strange to see him in the bonuses, however, and see him with his eyes OPEN.It's just simple, a little dirty and a different perspective of earth and the inhabitants with an talented cast.  The most incredible actor is Jane Curtain start to finish; at times you just can't fathom how this woman can go from point A to D to JKLMOP then Y, Z in 4.2 seconds flat and she makes it look so easy.  That's comedic timing and a woman with absolutely NO SHAME.It's well worth the bucks and much better than ANYTHING currently on tv.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Look, I'm no prude but I have to say that I have virtually watched every episode of this series up through season 5 and felt the need to warn parents.  If you plan to purchase these shows for family viewing with pre-teen children you may want to think twice.Please note that the Cast is "brilliant" and if not for them the show would be a flop.  The criticism I have lie with the writers.  Virtually "EVERY" episode contains sexual references, innuendos and dialogue pertaining to boobs, butts, asses, making-out, virginity, masturbation, intercourse etc .... Writer's favorite curses include: Bitch, Bastard and so-forth...  I understand that they are aliens experiencing human behavior for the first time but really ... really guys, virtually "EVERY" episode?  Give me a break.Again, the show works because the cast is always on it and give 100% with every performance, and it shows - but the writers sophomore attempts at consistent titillation for ratings and shock value becomes way tooo much.So, 5 Stars to the Performers and 0 stars for the writers (and producers) for saturating this wonderful show with a nonstop railroad of cheap shots.Again, a few shows I get.  But virtually EVERY episode, please??  So, FYI to the parents out there - just take note and don't be shocked when every character is jumping in bed with someone else ("The Odd Couple" it is not).

reviewText: Well, there were Lucy, Gilligan,etc..But for me, Dick Solomon and his family and friends will be alway remembered with pleasure by me. I'm so sad it only last 6 seasons. I wish it could be in it's 12th season now. I really do. Anyway I don't get tired to watch it over and over. It's amazing how everyone fits so well in their characters. I just don't understand why they all disappeared from the little screen.
summary: The Best TV Comedy I Ever Saw.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I already owned seasons 1-3 and had planned to buy the rest as they came on GB deals-well this deal came up and it was as cheap for me to purchase the entire set for a few dollars more than to buy seasons 4-6 separately. What is REALLY nice is these are individually wrapped and then wrapped again as a set-so guess what a few lucky folks will be getting for Christmas??? As for the series, IMHO which is shared by millions, IT IS one of the BEST adult comedy shows ever!!!! The actors are so well casted which is a rarity in itself. The writing is quick, intelligent, and witty. I cannot say how many times I laughed out laugh and eagerly awaited the next show to air the following week. Are all the shows a solid 5? No, but at least 3/4's are and the rest are still enjoyable. Although the Twilight Zone (the complete expensive series) is #1 in my heart for sci-fi, w/ the Outer Limits a close second, then Night Gallery, etc., this IS my favorite all time comedy TV show. Sometimes it is so relaxing to watch a show that doesn't require you to think, but simply laugh and be entertained.
summary: What a "gold deal" on the set!!!

reviewerName: Roy Anderson "War Buff - and civilian combatt...
reviewText: This magnificent situation comedy deserved the best in reproduction. IT HAS IT, in this magnificent DVD collection of the entire series.The editing - in particular the very efficient manouvering to achieve the exact episode/portion one wishes to view and the chance to easiliy correct a wrong choice/selection, is truly masterful.There can never be a more efficient and trouble free rendition of the truly wonderful original show, than this complete set of Third Rock provides. Very few reproductions, of original productions, reach the astoundingly high standards of this reproduction of Third Rock. Well done!

reviewText: I was a fan of this show when it aired originally and still am.  The writing is pure genius.  Once I bought the set, I started with season one and went through each season one at a time.  I am now on season five and it's amazing how much better it gets each season.I was in grad school when it was on the air and I often missed episodes because of class (this was before TiVo).  It is a pure joy to revisit these brilliant episodes and know I can return to them anytime I want.  I can't wait to see what season 6 is like!
